constructing grid
[equidistant grid (grid)]


Functions

bool surfit::grid_auto (REAL stepX=0, REAL stepY=0, REAL percent=2)
 constructs surfit_grid with cells size stepX and stepY, which covers all data.
bool surfit::grid_auto2 (REAL stepX, REAL stepY, REAL percent=2)
 constructs surfit_grid with cells size stepX and stepY, which covers all data. Amount of nodes in each direction is a number equal to , where n is a number.
bool surfit::grid_get (REAL startX, REAL endX, REAL stepX, REAL startY, REAL endY, REAL stepY, const char *name=NULL)
 constructs surfit_grid
bool surfit::grid_get2 (REAL startX, REAL endX, REAL stepX, REAL startY, REAL endY, REAL stepY, const char *name=NULL)
 constructs surfit_grid Amount of nodes in each direction is a number equal to , where n is a number.
bool surfit::grid_get_for_task (int Xnodes, int Ynodes, const char *name=NULL)
 constructs surfit_grid which covers surfit_task, and consists of Xnodes*Ynodes nodes.
bool surfit::grid_get_for_task_step (REAL stepX, REAL stepY, const char *name=NULL)
 constructs surfit_grid which covers surfit_task, with steps stepX and stepY.
bool surfit::grid_get_from_func (const char *name=NULL)
 constructs surfit_grid equal to surfit_func grid
bool surfit::grid_get_for_func (int Xnodes, int Ynodes, const char *name=NULL)
 constructs surfit_grid which covers surfit_task and nodes are coincident with grid of surfit_func
bool surfit::grid_get_for_func_step (REAL stepX, REAL stepY, const char *name=NULL)
 constructs surfit_grid with steps stepX and stepY and covers surfit_func

Function Documentation

bool surfit::grid_get (  REAL  startX,
REAL  endX,
REAL  stepX,
REAL  startY,
REAL  endY,
REAL  stepY,
const char *  name = NULL
) 
 

Parameters:
startX X-coordinate of the first node of the grid
endX X-coordinate of the last node of the grid
stepX distance between two neighbour X-nodes
startY Y-coordinate of the first node of the grid
endY Y-coordinate of the last node of the grid
stepY distance between two neighbour Y-nodes
name name for grid (optional)

bool surfit::grid_get2 (  REAL  startX,
REAL  endX,
REAL  stepX,
REAL  startY,
REAL  endY,
REAL  stepY,
const char *  name = NULL
) 
 

Parameters:
startX X-coordinate of the first node of the grid
endX X-coordinate of the last node of the grid
stepX distance between two neighbour X-nodes
startY Y-coordinate of the first node of the grid
endY Y-coordinate of the last node of the grid
stepY distance between two neighbour Y-nodes
name name for grid (optional)
